text:
i feel very disappointed with this product, i would say about 9 of my k-cups broke open and had to throw them away. then other ones i had coffee grounds in my coffee. i feel for this i should be given something for such i poor product. guess i will just stick to my green mountain coffee. this was the worst.

Brooklyn Bean Roastery Coffee, Fuhgeddaboudit, Single Serve Cup for Keurig K-Cup Brewers, 36-Count
